email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Vessel for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope this message finds you well.

We are looking to transport 12,500MT of coal from Newcastle to Qingdao under CIF terms. Could you provide a freight quote and confirm vessel availability? We would prefer a laycan between October 10 and October 20.

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
Liam Carter
Ocean Transport Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel MV SEA HORIZON, DWT 85,000, LOA 225m, for your shipment. The initial freight quote is USD 42 per metric ton. The laycan can be adjusted to October 12–18.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need further details.

Best regards,
Emily Zhang
Cargo Logistics Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Qingdao - Rate Discussion
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the prompt response. The rate of USD 42 seems slightly above our budget. Given the current market conditions, could you consider revising the rate to USD 40 per metric ton? Additionally, could you confirm the demurrage rate and loading window?

Best regards,
Liam Carter
Ocean Transport Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Qingdao - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for your feedback. Considering our long-standing relationship, we can offer a revised rate of USD 40.50 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day, pro rata, and the loading window is 72 hours.

Please confirm if this works for you.

Best regards,
Emily Zhang
Cargo Logistics Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Qingdao - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the revised offer. We accept the rate of USD 40.50 per metric ton and the laycan of October 12–18. Please proceed with the booking and send over the charter party for review.

Best regards,
Liam Carter
Ocean Transport Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for your confirmation. Attached is the charter party for your review. Let me know if any adjustments are needed.

Best regards,
Emily Zhang
Cargo Logistics Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Fwd: Charter Party for MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

The charter party looks good. We’ll proceed as agreed. Thank you for your assistance!

Best regards,
Liam Carter
Ocean Transport Ltd.
